/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.2.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2020 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Line, Bar } from "react-chartjs-2"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, Label, FormGroup, Input, Table, Row, Col, UncontrolledTooltip, Form, CardFooter, CardText, Text } from "reactstrap"; // core components import { chartExample1, chartExample2, chartExample3, chartExample4, } from "variables/charts.js"; function Dashboard(props) { var ohmsAtEveryEpoch = [ohmStaked]; for (let epoch = 1; epoch < 2095; epoch++) { ohmsAtEveryEpoch.push( ohmsAtEveryEpoch.at(-1) * (1 + rewardYield*(1-(rewardRateReduction * epoch / 1095)))); } const [ohmStaked, setOhmStaked] = React.useState(10); const [currPrice, setCurrPrice] = React.useState(1300); const [rewardYield, setRewardYield] = React.useState(0.00393); const [priceChange, setPriceChange] = React.useState(0); const [rewardRateReduction, setRewardRateReduction] = React.useState(0); function changeOhmStaked(e) { setOhmStaked(parseFloat(e.target.value)); } function changeCurrPrice(e) { setCurrPrice(parseFloat(e.target.value)); } function changeRewardYield(e) { setRewardYield(parseFloat(e.target.value)/100); } function changePriceChange(e) { setPriceChange(parseFloat(e.target.value)/100); } function changeRewardRateReduction(e) { setRewardRateReduction(parseFloat(e.target.value)/100); } function resetEpochArray(a) { a = [ohmStaked]; for (let epoch = 1; epoch < 2095; epoch++) { a.push( ohmsAtEveryEpoch.at(-1) * (1 + rewardYield*(1-(rewardRateReduction * epoch / 1095)))); } } function binarySearch(arr, target) { let start = 0, end = arr.length - 1; let ans = -1; while (start <= end) { let mid = parseInt((start + end) / 2, 10); if (arr[mid] <= target) start = mid + 1; else { ans = mid; end = mid - 1; } } return ans; } const [bigChartData, setbigChartData] = React.useState("data1"); const setBgChartData = (name) => { setbigChartData(name); }; return ( <>

changeOhmStaked(e)} /> changeCurrPrice(e)}/> changeRewardYield(e)}/> changePriceChange(e) } /> changeRewardRateReduction(e) } />

30 Days {ohmsAtEveryEpoch[90].toFixed(3)} {'$' + (ohmsAtEveryEpoch[90]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)).toLocaleString()} { String(Math.round(((ohmsAtEveryEpoch[90]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)) / (ohmStaked * currPrice)-1) * 100)) + '%' }
60 Days {ohmsAtEveryEpoch[180].toFixed(3)} {'$' + (ohmsAtEveryEpoch[180]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)).toLocaleString()} { String(Math.round(((ohmsAtEveryEpoch[180]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)) / (ohmStaked * currPrice)-1) * 100)) + '%' }
90 Days {ohmsAtEveryEpoch[270].toFixed(3)} {'$' + (ohmsAtEveryEpoch[270]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)).toLocaleString()} { String(Math.round(((ohmsAtEveryEpoch[270]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)) / (ohmStaked * currPrice)-1) * 100)) + '%' }
180 Days {ohmsAtEveryEpoch[540].toFixed(3)} {'$' + (ohmsAtEveryEpoch[540]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)).toLocaleString()} { String(Math.round(((ohmsAtEveryEpoch[540]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)) / (ohmStaked * currPrice)-1) * 100)) + '%' }
365 Days {ohmsAtEveryEpoch[1095].toFixed(3)} {'$' + (ohmsAtEveryEpoch[1095]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)).toLocaleString()} { String(Math.round(((ohmsAtEveryEpoch[1095]*currPrice*(1+priceChange)) / (ohmStaked * currPrice)-1) * 100)) + '%' }
Invested OHM will... Days USD Value 🤢
2X { Math.floor(binarySearch(ohmsAtEveryEpoch, 2 * ohmStaked) / 3) } { '$' + (2 * ohmStaked * currPrice * (1+priceChange)).toLocaleString() + '.00' }
5X { Math.floor(binarySearch(ohmsAtEveryEpoch, 5 * ohmStaked) / 3) } { '$' + (5 * ohmStaked * currPrice * (1+priceChange)).toLocaleString() + '.00' }
10X { Math.floor(binarySearch(ohmsAtEveryEpoch, 10 * ohmStaked) / 3) } { '$' + (10 * ohmStaked * currPrice * (1+priceChange)).toLocaleString() + '.00' }
100X { Math.floor(binarySearch(ohmsAtEveryEpoch, 100 * ohmStaked) / 3) } { '$' + (100 * ohmStaked * currPrice * (1+priceChange)).toLocaleString() + '.00' }
